org.qoders.easywallet.service.impl

Class ReceiptScanOcrapiserviceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.qoders.easywallet.service.impl.ReceiptScanOcrapiserviceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ReceiptScanService

    @Service
public class ReceiptScanOcrapiserviceImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements ReceiptScanService
    Implement receipt scan using ocrapiservice.com api (100 request per API key). This class will take image and send to ocrapiservice.com to recognize text, then it will parse text and make Receipt object
    Author:
    Nhu Trinh
